definitions.definition: The state of one who has fainted; a swoon.
(of a being) Lacking strength; weak; languid; inclined to lose consciousness
definitions.example: I felt faint after my fifth gin and tonic.

definitions.definition: Lacking courage, spirit, or energy; cowardly; dejected
Barely perceptible; not bright, or loud, or sharp
definitions.example: There was a faint red light in the distance.

definitions.definition: Performed, done, or acted, weakly; not exhibiting vigor, strength, or energy

To lose consciousness through a lack of oxygen or nutrients to the brain, usually as a result of suddenly reduced blood flow (may be caused by emotional trauma, loss of blood or various medical conditions).
To sink into dejection; to lose courage or spirit; to become depressed or despondent.
To decay; to disappear; to vanish.
